channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Sarah & Duck
channel.desc: Extra Bounce. Animation. John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Charlie and Lola
channel.desc: I've Got Nobody to Play With. Children's animation with the siblings. Playing piggy in the middle is fun, but you need other people. Lola has her imaginary friend Soren Lorenson.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Woly Holiday. The Wols visit the Clangers Planet for a nice day out, but things don't go as planned.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Tombliboo Ooo Drinks Everybody Else's Pinky Ponk Juice. Children's programme. Everyone enjoys a ride on the Pinky Ponk, but Ooo is more interested in drinking Pinky Ponk juice.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Eddie Redmayne - If I Had a Dinosaur. A story read by a special guest. Eddie Redmayne reads a story about a little girl who wonders which animal would make the best pet.
